description: Golden query pack with Tune/Holdout split for retrieval accuracy optimization. Generalizable evidence rules only - no corpus-specific hardcoding.

queries.query_text: What does error AUTH401 mean for ToolX?

expected_evidence_rules.description: Error code query should return TROUBLESHOOT doc with exact error code

queries.query_text: How do I fix HTTP 504 timeout errors in ToolX?

expected_evidence_rules.description: Error troubleshooting query should return TROUBLESHOOT doc with error details

queries.query_text: ToolY upload is blocked with ERR-UPL-013

expected_evidence_rules.description: Specific error code should return exact troubleshooting doc

queries.query_text: What causes ERR-PWD-007 in ToolZ?

expected_evidence_rules.description: Error code query should find specific troubleshooting doc

queries.query_text: I'm getting authentication errors in ToolX

expected_evidence_rules.description: Generic auth error should return auth troubleshooting docs

queries.query_text: What is error code XYZ-999?

expected_evidence_rules.description: Unknown error code - any result acceptable (escalation case)

queries.query_text: List all error codes for ToolX

expected_evidence_rules.description: List query should return REFERENCE doc (error catalog)
